籤詩版本二:
Marimi omoto anopisa anosvika kudenga, uye murazvo unomera mumirazvo
Pakupedzisira, ichabudirira uye haizokanganisi, icharamba ichimera mashizha nemidzi.
詩意:
Iyi hexagram yakafanana nelotus iri kukura mumoto.
Zvose zvinoita sezvine ngozi asi hazvina ngozi.
解曰: Kunyangwe panjodzi. Hapana chakaipa pamuviri wake. Kuita raramo. Vese vanosangana nevanhu vakanaka.
籤詩故事一:
◇Fire Gourd Valley
Munguva yeHumambo Hutatu, Liu Bei naZhou Yu vakabatana kurwisa Cao Cao. Kong Ming akagadzira chikuva chenyeredzi nomwe kuti vanamate mhepo yekumabvazuva uye akabatsira Zhou Yu kupisa Red Cliff. Hondo yaCao Cao yakapiswa ndokutiza nekutya. Cao Cao akatizawo nehondo yakanga yakundwa.
Vakuru vechikwata cheKongming vakahwandira kwese kwese.
Cao Cao akaenda kumuromo weHulu Valley kunozorora uye kubika. Achiona kuti nzvimbo yacho yakanga ine ngozi uye pakanga pasina kuvandira, akaseka.
Pakarepo akanzwa kurira kwengano uye Zhang Fei akauya kuzomuuraya.
Moto wakabvira kwese kwese mumupata, uye mauto aCao Cao akatambura.Cao Cao akakwira bhiza rake akatiza achivhunduka ari mumoto.
Kunda uye enda kuHuarong Road.
(Kunyangwe ari munjodzi, anogona kuponesa hupenyu hwake.)
聖意: Mumba hamuna kumira zvakanaka.Chenjerai kutsvaga pfuma, basa, kutengeserana, kuroora nhubu, kuvharisa Liujia, nyevero yenhema, kuvharirwa nevanofamba netsoka, kurasikirwa nemakonye esirika muminda, kurasikirwa nezvipfuyo, kurasikirwa nevanhu, kutongwa kumadokero. , kurasikirwa kwekutama, kuchengetedza, kurasikirwa nepfuma, kurwara, kutakurwa, kuchinjwa kweguva remakomo
